acceptance_criteria: Inventory is empty by default; no specific tool imports.
Scans `engines/connectors` OR reads `ENABLED_CONNECTORS` config to load modules dynamically.
Ensure `PUT /drafts` and `GET /drafts` work with new loader/inventory.
GateChain must read `ActivationOverlay` from Policy Store to find `requires_firearms` status.
Ensure all exist in correct location and use `RequestContext`.
Full integration test: Create Draft -> Publish -> Enforce Policy.
